message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this valuable product to you today. I think it would be perfect for you! I'm asking for $150 to start. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm looking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $120?
Hi Bob, I understand your budget concerns.  Could we meet in the middle at $135?
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate it. Considering my budget constraints, could we possibly agree on $125 for the product?
